title: Request ASL Interpreter for Class
description: A deaf student needs to request an American Sign Language (ASL) interpreter for one of their newly registered classes.

tasks.description: Identify the student and confirm their approved accommodation for ASL interpretation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the student's record includes 'ASL Interpreter for lectures'.

tasks.description: Collect the details of the course requiring the interpreter (course name, schedule, location).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers all necessary logistical information.

tasks.description: Submit a request to the interpreter scheduling coordinator with the course details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a service request in the scheduling system.
